topic: Vector Search must be first stage

key_fact: Error guidance references 7.0.2+ and earlier-than-6.0.11 or 7.0.2 needs upgrade
8.0 query source collection; 8.1+ query view directly
ordered runs series; unordered runs parallel and can reorder
Self-managed automated embeddings are Preview and release-sensitive
Self-managed automated embedding uses autoEmbed syntax block
Feature available for Community Edition 8.2+ self-managed deployments
Query path uses query.text and model compatibility rules
Atlas private preview routes inference through GCP with M10+ requirement
Atlas private preview syntax uses text type with voyage-3 model set
skills CLI supports Claude Code Codex Cursor and many additional agents
Current install command is npx skills add source

topic: Skills CLI agent install path mapping
key_fact: Claude Code Codex Cursor project and global skills paths are explicitly defined

topic: Skills CLI symlink and canonical install model
key_fact: Installer copies to canonical .agents/skills then symlinks to agent paths with copy fallback
